content.detailedDescription: Ok, well i was on my way to the gas station about 3 miles south of where i live, and i noticed something to the east. i live about 30 miles west of orlando so there is always air traffic and flashing towers on the horizon. then as i looked more to the east i realized that what i saw was not an airplane(as there were visible aircraft in the distance) and was not was not a cell phone tower. what i saw at first were two green/white lights aligned horizontally. that appeared to change from green to white, and two red lights aligned vertacally that flashed at first in a regular pattern top to bottom. well i decided to pull over, and watch from the side of the road. i was there for about fifteen minutes. while i watched the lights seem to move slowly to the north, then slowly to the south. the whole time i had two cell towers and what looked like regular air traffic from orland international airport in my view. while the towers are covered in flashing lights, and about 10 miles away, the airport is about 30 miles away. so i had some point of reference to judge the distance of the lights. at first they seemed maybe, 20-25 miles aways as i continued to watch though they seemed much further. after the first 15 mintutes or so i got back in my truck and continued to the gas station. the whole time i could not get a clear view of the east. i filled up and drove back north about a mile, and parked alongside old hwy 50 adjacent to the florida turnpike. i looked towards the east again and still saw the lights, yet they were a little bit further south. then once aqain they started towards the north, when they turned they seemed to change. they went from four easily discernable lights to, a solid green horizontal light, and a slolid vertical red flashing pattern. sometimes the vertical red light was flashing in one complete flash, and then it would flash top to bottom and bottom to top. i do not know what i saw, i do know that i have lived her 24 years and have never seen anything like this. it seem towards the last ten minutes or so to be moving further east, and when i saw an obvious strobe of an air craft it seemed to move away. every time from the north and the south. not fast, but not slow either. like i have stated it moved from north to south, and south to north, over and over again, but went much further south than north. it almost seemed to react with the air traffic around it. i just honestly want to know what i saw. thank you for reading this and hope to hear from you.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Solid white/green lights arranged horizontally and two then a solid red light vertacally

content.detailedDescription:
Hello, 
this incident happened sometime ago in anchorage alaska, i lived at 1331 west 26th ave. #1.  i had a small area of sight from my front room and parking area that i know was over the anchorage international airport because i lived there for 7 years (that address - 30 yrs total in ak) and i know the flight pattern over the airport, the whole town knows the flight pattern. anyway, it was evening, must have been between 5 and 7 pm  
and it was dark so it was winter time. i had been home a short time from work when i looked out my window and saw something odd looking. it was fairly high in the air and appeared to be orangeish color with some red and seemed to be very hot, i went outside to get a better view, my brother was with me during all this and i pointed it out to him and he couldn't figure what it was but we both watched this thing and as we watched, it seemed to be like a hot molten or burning object, i say this because that is how it acted and while watching this it "dripped" off a piece from the bottom which seemed to drop or drip like something very hot - like hot metal would burn or boil and drip "molten like" all this time i am thinking "my god, i hope that's not a small plane burning in the air" (i mention this because next to the int'l ariport is lake hood, a busy small plane and floatplane base) i was waiting for the thing to just drop out of the sky but during this whole time it stayed in one place. it didn't fall, or move up or down or explode, it didn't move right or left - it just stayed where it was. the part that dripped off didn't drop far before dissapearing, with-in approx 4 to 6 min the whole thing just "dissapeared"!. i was so sure that something was happening that i was sure i would see it on the news, or a special report coming on tv. i was so sure that i called everyone i could think of, the local news stations, the radio stations, the police department, the faa, and i called the tower at the airport! no one saw anything!. i described what i saw and it seems that only myself and my brother and my landlady saw it. she has passed. i don't remember the exact date - but i rememeber exactly what i saw. just wanted to pass this on - have you ever had a similar report?Would appreciate your reply. thank you for your time,
janna schroeder.
content.summary: Looked like a burning or molten object with round appearance

content.detailedDescription:
Simply i walked outside looked up i was at work as usual when this happened.

at first i would be like huh ok whats that its day light giving off an enormous amount of light and i'm like maybe its the reflection of the sun hitting this unknown jet of some kind but then maybe not.

simply because it fade in and out constantly something that jet liners simply do not do so at anyrate this was east of the mountains heading south didn't last very long it is why i don;t have very much to report about but i do believe it was the same object i've already reported twice within the past 3 weeks doing the exact same thing in aprox. same location.
content.summary: Bright and fast

content.detailedDescription: Similar object appear on video: 03,04,05,20,26 january 2008
content.summary: Object changes suddenly flight direction

content.detailedDescription:
We had this experience few months back, but i didnt think any one is going to believe us. until i saw your progarm on the history , thats how i thought i could share it with the world.
i and two of my friends went on a picnic to a mountainous region near the quetta city at about 4 hours ride. as we were going to leave that place one of my friend ahmad noticed something in the sky and he started yelling, and showed us that (ufo) thing in the sky, there were 4 small but bright lights in circle, in the begining when we saw it it was still but then it started moving about 5 min later, it was really amazing i mean no one of us could believe what we were watching, coz we had never seen anything like that before.
we were in sight of that object for about 25 min and then it disappeared into tne sky.
for about a week we were trying to convince family and others about what we have seen but no one believed us.
we also took some photographs of it, but doesnt describe it very well.
content.summary: Many small lights glowing in a circle, like a disc is flying.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i and serveral neighbors (with their children) had just come in from fishing, when i saw a very bright object in the western sky. (three adults and three children watched it)

2. the brightness.  the sky was very clear, blue, the sun was going down.  we saw several jets in the area that were leaving long vapor trails.

3. it was so bright.  first we thought that it was a jet moving away from us at the angle that it appeared to not be moving.  we compared it with the other aircraft and we found that the object was not leaving a long trail, not moving and was the brightest object in the sky.  next we thought that it was the space station, but a quick call to a friend in that field and we learned that the station was not at location that we could see. we first thought that it was not moving until we compared it with the moon.  we had a full moon rising in the east.  we saw that the moon was rising at the same pace as the object was dropping in the west. the rotation of the earth caused the object to appear that it was going down in the horizon. no other star was in the sky and the sun was still up.  i was now thinking that it was a satellite.

4. the object was very bright and appeared to have shape,  using a pair of binoculars we all saw an inverted "v" shape.  no actions it just went down in the western horizon and the moon came up in the east.

5.  i had heard about the event in texas.  i did go on line and that is when i saw the video with the news story.  it was the same shape and object that we had seen in florida.
content.summary: Bright, very bright, inverted "v"

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 11o clock  on saturday night. i had just gotten done my delivery job at the local pizza shop. i pulled up on dunbury road, in fairless hills to pick up a friend of mine. as i pulled up to his house, pointed east, he got into my vehicle and something over the tree line of vermillion hills woods caught our eye. it was a plane that was flying towards us that made us look, but the funny thing was, after we realized it was a plane flying next to a distant star we no longer had our sites set on the plane, it was the star that appeared to be blinking. red, white and green lights. we drove up the block to my driveway and called some family members to get out the camera and telescope. all i told them was, they need to make sure im not seeing things. when the 3 family members came out front i asked the to do the following things. first, locate the north star. then locate mars. finally locate saturn. ( i did this to make sure it was not one of those stars, cause it was burning as bright as one )when that was all done, i directed their attention eastward and asked them what they saw. at first the answer was a distant plane. then i told them to look again. it was not a plane. we observed every star that night in the cold atmosphere and they all displayed the same characteristics. blue hue, with a white star. this one was different. it was out there all by itself. at times it would fade out almost to nothing, then come back more intense than ever. at a point, we could not tell if our eyes were playing tricks on us, but 2 of us thought we saw at the same time something faint fly around the object in a circular motion. i called a friend who lives on the other side of town, and told him to do the same thing i did to everyone else, and the then tell me what he saw to the left of the moon.  he told me he saw 2 objects that looked like stars almost on top of each other. we know he had the right star, but we could not see that from our vantage point. so since it was freezing cold and we were already outside for 2 hours and the thing got no closer, we went in to see what the net had to say about the nights sky. the only thing on the net was something about a comet hitting mars.

well that was saturday. so last night, (monday) we decide to look to the sky. there is nothing in the sky where we saw the object a 2 nights before. so i take a ride down to my buddys house on the other end of town, and as soon as i pull up his street, there it  is. except this time i can see the two lights. we watched it for a minute and then drove back to my house to get the telescope. when we got to my house there was nothing in the sky. can anyone tell me what was suppost to be in the in the eastern hemisphere over the weekend, parallel to the moon to the left, glowing unlike any star in the sky?

the reason why i am writing this is because i would like to know what was out there, and because i live in a town with no ufo reports ever. ironically friday night, there were 2 calls to the falls police station about a ufo being over an old restruant in the area. how weird is that?
content.summary: To the left of the moon

content.detailedDescription: A few weeks before the picture was taken i had heard that there was supposed to be a semi eclipse happening that day. around the time that the eclipse was due to happen i had my camera on me so that i could get a picture of this event. i was in the car driving around trying to find the most strategic spot to get a picture but the eclipse never happened. due to this disappointment i began taking pictures of the sky because the colors just looked bright an fluidlike. after taking a few pictures i went home and uploaded the pictures onto my laptop. after uploading i realized that the pictures that i took of the same part of the sky had a spot that looked as if something was there but wasnt.  i can see the shape of some type of ship though when i took the photo all i saw was sky. the photo i uploaded has not been altered in anyways. i do not know what quite to make of the picture that i took but i do believe in a part of me that it is an invisible to the naked eye ship that was coasting through the atmosphere. please contact me if you also see the same ship that i see in the photos because i am very interested in your thoughts on the photo.
content.summary: A picture of an invisible aircraft

content.detailedDescription: Driving northbound on the 57 freeway through fullerton, we observe what appears to be a meteorite with a long and beautiful tail in the ne sky.  when it does not disappear after 10-15 seconds we, as well as everyone else on the freeway are slowing and braking and seeing this object make a 90 degree turn.  then a second object appears and they both are moving strangely and not burning out and i am getting really excited and saying, "what in the heck is that!?!" to my friend, the driver of the car i am riding in.  he is an faa pilot and has seen many "shooting stars" before as well as pyrotechnics and confirms that we are not seeing fireworks.  the two objects seem to burn out and disappear, then all of sudden flare up again and take off, only now there are three parts.  then all three parts disappeared from sight.  i called 911 on my cell phone to report this and ask the dispatcher if there have been any other calls, but she does not know or won't tell me.  later i called the orange county sheriff's dept. as well as kfi radio but no one had any information.  i know many people driving witnessed this event.  i posted a note on craigslist. org to try and find others that saw this event and was contacted by someone in the city of placentia who witnessed this from the ground and said it was a blimp-like flaming object.
content.summary: Meteor/astroid-like object(s) enter earth's atmosphere and do not burn out immediately but swoop and make 90 degree manuevers before they disappear.

content.detailedDescription: It was almost six o'clock on saturday night. it was cold, slightly windy, and dark. finally a night to relax; i decided to set up my telescope in my back yard. facing south and looking up at the sky, viewing conditions were terrible; a very heavy cloud cover blanket with an over glow of city lights. i figured what the hell, i lit a cigarette, and decided to wait for a cloud break. i just wanted to zoom on to one star, get my fix, and head back into the warmth of my house!  while gazing up (not through the telescope) within the sky something very unusual happened. i observed what looked like an over-sized star. almost directly above my head, at 500 hundred feet up in the sky (?Estimated?)...I said to myself, "oh wow, what a big star..." chills went up my spine at that very second, because i realized it was not a star. due to its altitude, brightness, and size. it appeared to be a super star and it quickly, incrementally, gained an incredible amount of brightness, and peaked its brightness. it lit up so bright white i was frozen stiff. and then it simply vanished...I was honestly scared. i am no scientist, just a space gazer, but i know what i witnessed. it's fair to say that a natural weather phenomenon could be excluded as far as an explanation for what i observed. furthermore, the star-like object did not move, it took on an incredible brightening, and did not make any noise at all. it remained in the same position for the duration of no longer than six seconds. i also observed some aircraft in the sky a later that very night, and there can be no comparison at all. it was just so strange that it shocked me, and i could not resolve this occurrence with any rational explanation at the moment, or now. so i ran inside to tell my wife what happened. she didn't seem to take me seriously so, i returned a few minutes later to catch some stars on the telescope. nothing else strange happened that night, but it is definitely worth being documented here. i feel better sharing my experience here.
content.summary: Star-burst

content.detailedDescription: I was going across town (jeff hill) to pick up someone.When i crossed the intersection across highway 36 something was glowing in the clear night sky.I didnt think it was nothing until it slowed down like it was making a landing, but before it got close to the ground it dissapeared.It was going at a high rate of speed, but it didnt have a trail of light as if it was a meteorite or a shooting star.It just glowed in the night sky as if it was some kind of air vehicle making a landing.I wanted to go investigate, but couldnt figure out where it landed if landed at all.This is about the time i grabbed my camera phone to take a picture, but i was so mesmorized it was too late.
content.summary: It was a white glowing oval shaped object

content.detailedDescription: Me and my five friends came to the park to play when we saw an airplane and a white disc shape hovering after the airplane its yellow lights are visible because its a little dark in the park. then we watched it up to 5 mins after it dissapeared in the clouds
content.summary: White disc shape hovering in north olympus park

content.detailedDescription:
Afirst it looked very similar to 2 asteroids entering the earths orbit, 2 orange elliptical fireballs falling to earth, with what looked like a trail of fire behind them.  it seemed like that at first until they both slowed and hovered, and begand to fly around, around the same altitude.  they then descended more, leaving behind a trail of what seemed to be some kind of smoke, but dissapated rapidly.  they then hovered around some more and began to descend again, they repeated this until they were below the trees and out of sight, i did not see them again.  i thought i was seeing things, but now i hear my friends saying they saw the same thing too, he called anaheim and asked if there had been sightings, and the operator said there had.  unfortunatelly, i was unable to capture these objects on camera.

i also would like to note that it seemed like one of them faded out almost completely of sight, then relit to its normal intensity.  they were easily spotted againsed the dark sky.

i also spotted a general aviation pilot flying around the 2 objects, probably as curious as i was, but im sure the other object was just that, a normal plane.
content.summary: 2 objects falling followed by hovering and continued falling

content.detailedDescription:
I'm a comprehensive mental health case manager for volunteers of america, and am currently pursuing a masters in counseling psychology. anything that sounds like a definitive conclusion that i may mention i stress is purely speculative on my part. i'd like to think my background is fairly based in scientific observation.

this occurred at 6:25 pm on friday, january 11, 2008. i was in my car in lake charles, la. i had turned off 5th avenue onto prien lake rd., headed east-bound towards the onramp onto interstate 2-10 west (where i was going to merge). there is a fairly short distance between that corner and the onramp, perhaps a half mile. i noticed up to my left something that i hadn't seen before. i assumed it was a tower; lake charles is a fairly large town so it didn't surprise me that i had missed seeing it before. the reason i thought it was a tower was because it appeared almost stationary, and was about the height of a tower top. there was three white lights in a triangular formation, and along the back base was a blinking red light. i thought for sure it was a tower top, yet when i kept trying to locate the actual tower itself, i couldn't see it. it was dark, so i assumed that it was just obscured. then i realized it was moving.

at that point my onramp was coming up, so instead of pulling over and risk not being able to get a good shot of this thing, i merged onto 2-10 west-bound and grabbed my 5 megapixel digital camera out of my tech bag (i keep my psp, ds, and cam in there when i spend a couple days away from my apartment). the thing was moving slow still, from north to southwest. i took an initial picture with the flash on, which looked like crap because of the glare of my dirty windshield. i turned the flash off and took several more photos. the thing disappeared over the southwest horizon just before i hit the 2-10 bridge of the calcasieu ship channel.

i wouldn't have given this a second thought if the thing hadn't just *sat* in place while i passed it, and like i said, it seemed somewhat low over the oak park area of lake charles. my camera picked up little more than taillights and darkness, except for one picture. i had to adjust the brightness on it to see anything, but i believe i may have gotten it on the right side of the frame.

i've been monitoring local media to see if anyone else saw it, but i've heard nothing yet. traffic was fairly busy, too, at that time. i will say this, too: i've been to long island, ny, so i know what real air traffic looks like. we don't get that here, but as soon as this thing was out of sight, lots of planes with blinkblink-pause, blinkblink-pause white running lights started popping up all over. i'm not saying they were chasing anything, just that they were there in stronger numbers than i remember seeing before.

i've attached the single photo that looks like it might show anything, and boxed out where i think the object is.
content.summary: Triangular object hovers, then passes over i-210

content.detailedDescription: On january 25th we were taking my brother to school and when we were crossing the bridge i noticed something moving around in the sky. i thought at first it was the sunlight just playing tricks on me but then the fighter jets showed up. there were two of them slowly approaching the thing. then i realized it wasn't just the light. the thing was shiny and looked like some type of metal shining in the sunlight. the thing was suddenly gone and the fighters zoomed after it. my friends and i have been seeing these things and it is starting to freak us out. please reply, owen.
content.summary: Round thing in sky not airplane going really fast by mount hood.

content.detailedDescription:
While working on a commercial shoot at mt wilson observatory i was photographing the los angeles city lights from the parking lot.

nothing was seen while on the site by me or any of the 50+ crew members or upon initial review of these pictures.

i reviewed the shots again 2 years later for another project and i found this interesting shape hanging in the sky.

there is a second picture where only one of the corners is visible.

shot on a canon 20d
17-40mm l series lens @ 28mm
iso 1600
f 2.8
1/8 sec exposure
content.summary: Triangle with purple lights on each corner

content.detailedDescription:
Ok i had received a mini dv cam for christmas last year and i wanted to practice shooting video so i decided to go outside and shoot the airplanes going by.
i pointed the camera up to capture a plane and thats when i saw this black
object.It looked very unatural, my girlfriend was outside with me and she watched it with me.
i tried to do the best i could at filming it but this was like the 3rd or 4th time i had ever used my camera.I filmed it until i couldnt see it anymore,
it made no sound.And it seemed to come from out of no where.It kept changing shape and it was black on the outside with a bright light in the middle.
content.summary: Ufo hovers over my house for about 5 seconds and then slowly rises up

content.detailedDescription: In the afternoon i was  in my backyard doing some gardening in south east portland and heard noisy engines . looked up and saw white lighted disc being chased by 2 fighter planes. the disc ducked into a cloud ( there wasnt many of them that day, only a couple of little clouds) and the 2 fighter planes followed into the clouds. the disc disappeared behind the cloud (during this i debated whether i should go get my camera, but decided not to because maybe i would miss the disc coming out from behind the cloud). never seen the disc come back out, only the 2 planes. the disc did not have any engine noise . i saw all of this as clear as a bell. im not sure of the date. wish i would have written it down, it was the summer of 2006, i think. i am positive of what i seen in the sky. i was awed by the experience. the reason i didnt write the date down was that every one i told did not believe it.
content.summary: Disc being chased by 2 fighter planes

content.detailedDescription:
I was 5 or6 years old and lived on motor avenue in palms, california.  i was running about with another boy around my age and i remember the conversation, saying that his dad was in the airforce and he transported some space men in his plane.  an additional image in my mind was that they were laying down on racks as if they were shipped.

this is all i can remember and just wanted to relay that to you.

if there is a person from that location and time period talking about the same thing let me know.
content.summary: Conversation

content.detailedDescription: Not sure of exact time or day but it was during the meteor shower in august 2007 , i never miss those events, at first i thought it was three satellites moving at the exact same speed, moving exactly the same space apart, but then realized that was imposible. i know nothing flies south to north in the northern skies, out in the middle of nowhere.It made no sound and made no chemtrail either. this is in southcentral alaska 50 miles west of glennallen. this event happened in late july or early august.  i noticed also at least 10 meteors over six to eight hours late in the evening and morning, it was a slow meteor sighting night. i noticed most is that it was dark out but clear and it was moving , direcltly overhead perfect triangle with light on each corner.Watched it till i could not see it any more to the north. the next couple weeks after things seemed kind of strange, cant explain though in words.
content.summary: Watching the meteor shower, i saw large  silent triangle move south to north, with lights on each corner

content.detailedDescription:
While walking the dog on a main road i saw a revolving ball of light at approx. 50-100feet in the air travelling horizontally in a straight line. no noise the sky was clear no rain or clouds. it was not a helicopter or aeroplane i am positive of that the light i seen seemed to be on a dark object but could not make it out properly as the light revolving around it took my attention for the 10 seconds or so i seen it. it was heading in the direction of a transmitter mast on a area called the black isle in inverness-shire scotland. when i started to try and type what i had seen i found it very difficult to type properly i thought there was something wrong with my keyboard i couldn't realy understand what i had seen and then try and put it into words, i felt a bit odd to be honest    



                         any ideas 
          
                                  thanks

                                          ian calderwood
content.summary: revolving ball of light/object

content.detailedDescription:
As i was returning home from ogdensburg, ny traveling south/south east on ny 812 i observed a deep orange ball like object which appeared to be moving slowly passing in and out of the cloud cover to the south.  object was oriented nearly parallel to my direction of travel at an angular elevation of 15 to 25 degrees above the visual horizon directly in front of my vehicle.  this sighting was not particularly extraordinary when compared to a similar sighting i had about 4 1/2 years ago in late september or early october of 2003.  i was traveling the same route home at approximately the same time of day which means it was still daylight rather than dark as it was during this most recent event.  a bit different scenario as several deep orange balls suddenly appeared (in turn) in the sky directly in front of my vehicle at a similar angular elevation.  this time the sky was virtually cloudless and the balls remained visible for the duration of the trip home.  the total number was difficult to ascertain as they would extinguish and a different one would suddenly bloom into view.  i live on an old farm with no close neighbors (approximately 2000 feet on either side none front and rear.  orange balls were plainly visible when i arrived home so i got out a set of binoculars (12x50) and resting my elbows on the hand rails of my steps proceeded to view them at length trough the binoculars.  balls of orange (roughly the color of setting sun) continued to extinguish and bloom.  direction from my farm south/south east.  since it appeared that this was going to be a prolonged visual i decided to call my nearest neighbors from whom i had purchased the farm.  at first they did not see them apparently because they were looking too high in the sky.  when they did the husband stated "must be something down at drum".  they were not particularly intrigued by the display and quickly lost interest since they were convince that the objects had something to do with nearby fort drum, ny.  i continued to view the object through my binoculars attempting to observe any effects that would convince me that they were military flares of some sort.  as the evening wore on and the light faded i convinced myself that i was observing some type of military flare because it appeared that there a dark vertical column of perhaps smoke rising from the orange balls.  this dark column appeared to be at most 10% of the diameter of the balls extending upward about 10 diameters of the balls.  interesting i could see no evidence of a parachute above the hovering balls.  individual balls did not noticeably descend however they were randomly staggered in a gaggle vertically and horizontally.  about 2130 having watched them for about 3 hours and convinced they were some sort of goings on at fort drum i abandoned my vigil.  i continued to glance toward them occasionally throughout the evening and about 2300 they were no longer visible.  

subsequent to this event i began to rethink some of the events and my concussions. it is about 15 miles to the nearest boundary of fort drum from  my farm.  if these were some sort of training activity the likelihood is that it would not be conducted directly on the border of the base and the public property.  assuming 20 miles to the activity flat earth 20 degree elevation angle the flares would have been approximately 7.25 miles agl (20*tan20).  drum is an army base their flying machines are helicopters i don't think there are any helicopters that can operate at 35000+ feet.  the usaf illumination flares i am familiar with from the 60's and 70's burned with a brilliant white light since they used a magnesium compound as a fuel.  the parachute was an integral portion of the system as it reflected some of the light back toward the ground.  my recollection is they were deployed below 10000 feet (probably below 5000 feet) and they steadily descended unlike the orange balls.  why orange?  ecm flares have no chutes and burn for a relatively short time, additionally they free fall and would normally have horizontal velocity components.  i did a google search for orange flares to no avail.  

i am a 65 yo retired dod engineer with 10 years active duty usaf about 18 years dod.  have had at least two and more than likely three other probable ufo incidents.  i would be interested if any military or dod know of any orange flares that would be used by the military and why they would be deploy at such an extreme altitude.  the orange balls appeared to be of a size such that i would estimate it would have taken 3 to 4 of them inline to go from edge to edge of the moon.  my guesstimate is that the largest number of balls in view at any one time was 10 to 12.  episode started with a single ball appearing in front of my windshield as if it had been uncovered; continued with them appearing and disappearing suddenly.
content.summary: Deep orange object moving slowly in and out of cloud cover

content.detailedDescription: We/mghee & mesmer families were having a birthday celebration dinner for thenext door naighbor's wife. (mesmer) both families are good friends. both families have had sightings. dale (witness one) had a weeks vacation and spent three evenings searching the skies for ufo's that week as there had been activity on and off over the past few years. dale saw nothing in the three evenings he was out. his next door neighbor (witness 2)who has had multiple sightings and is the subject of an ongoing investigation said "lets go to my house (next door) and take a look off my back deck" to see if there is anything out there. done on a whim. they went to the neighbors house. they took a pair of binoculars and a pair of night vision binoculars owned by witness #2. as they looked off the back deck of the house of witness 2-witness 1 (dale) saw two large glowing orbs flying in a northwest to southeast direction and saw the two orbs through the night vision binoculars. the two objects flew diagonally across the back of the field behind witness #2's house. the orbs were large, glowing and silent. the sighting lasted perhaps 2 minutes in length. the objects were first seen through the the night vision binoculars then with regular binoculars and with eyesight.
content.summary: Two witnesses see two large bright silent glowing orbs  at the same time.

content.detailedDescription:
* ufo is right above the mountains.

after a storm, i was out taking pix of the mountains, with the clouds rolling over them. i took lots of pix and did not go thru them until i got home and had downloaded them on to my computer.
i did not notice this unidentified object until i was looking thru the photos on my laptop. it does not look like a bird and it appears to have a strong shadow underneath it. i am not claiming it's a ufo, but it doesn't look like anything i recognize. do you know anyone that can analyze this photo and give an opinion?
content.summary: Picture

content.detailedDescription:
This is actually my dad's caregiver's story. she does not believe in ufos but on jan. 9, 2008 told me of an unusual experience she had the night before (jan 8, 2008).  she wanted to know what my husband thought of it, as he was a army med-evac pilot for 25 years.  she told that she went to the mailbox around 7-8:00 pm.  they live in a small subdivision in aubrey, texas.  after placing her letters in the mailbox, she noticed two very bright and very low flying objects moving quickly toward her, just over the houses on the south side of her street.  she thought they were airplanes or helicopters.  she was perplexed by how low they were and as they got closer to her, she realized there was not any noise normally associated with aircraft.  just as they approached her, they made a sharp turn and headed south, toward denton. this is when she lost sight of them.  she said they were shaped like two hands cupped together and had the brightest lights she had ever seen.

if you are interested in hearing this story directly from her, i am sure she would talk with you.  she loves to talk!  i have known this woman for four years and i would trust her with my life and every cent i own.  she is undoubtedly the most truthful person i have even known.  please let me know if you would like to talk with her.  i thought perhaps her story might aid you in your investigation of the january 8th sightings.

best regards,
theresa wood
content.summary: Thin, very bright lights,shaped like 2 hands cupped together

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my backyard and saw two orange lights. i noticed them after looking up to see what was making noise in the tree. (it was a squirrel). they were about one hundred yards apart and i would estimate 1,000 ft. above the ground. i could not see waht was between them but it was darker than the rest of the sky so i assume thre was something there. they moved across the sky silently from the n.W. to the s.E. right over my house. they disappeared about three blocks from my house. i felt very nervous after i saw this but eventually calmed down and felt a kind of content feeling.
content.summary: Strange lights moving across the sky.

i was taking pictures to a dog on the snow. i saw the pictures after .

i don���t ear nothing and i don���t saw nothing. the aircrafts on the area of ���vora alentejo portugal on this date they can't fly because of the ice on the asphalt. if it was a plane i think i can ear it very well.

the very strange think that i saw it was the dog. before the pictures the dog it was very excited and running to diferent locals always playing. after that the dog still calm, quiet and don't play more for 20 or 30 min.

content.detailedDescription: I work in a recording studio and on occasion i will walk outside while taking a break to get fresh air and on occasion to use the phone. this particular night i walked to the end of the building and leaned against it while making a phone call. i didn't really notice anything at first upon looking into the southeast sky. having seen the constellation orion many times i am very familiar with it's stars and their alignment. while chatting on the phone i noticed there was a bright "star" within close proximity to orion. i had never noticed this bright "star" before. shortly thereafter i ended my phone conversation and turned my full attention to it. while i was curiously staring and wondering why i hadn't noticed it faded away within 3 seconds. it was as if it had a dimmer on it and was just turned off. it was shocking because all the other stars next to it were so clear in the sky and this object was brighter than them. there were no clouds in the sky at all. i made a point of paying close attention to the weather conditions. the whole time i looked it seemed to move just ever so slightly but i couldn't really tell if it was or not. i think that's why i was staring at it so much too. i had the impression that it was not completely stationary but not really moving much either. i was so surprised by this event i called my friend back immediately and told her about it. it was pretty exciting to see something out of the ordinary. i was awestruck by this event even though it wasn't a spectacular sighting by any means. i went back to work and when i got the chance to go out and look again a couple of hours later, clouds had moved in. i don't remember exactly when the date was that this happened which is why i put approximate time of incident.
content.summary: Star type object
